elements.name: controlId
elements.description: Always 42.

elements.name: supplierIdCode
elements.description: A code identifying the supplier. Refer to CBP Directive 3500-13 of November 24, 1986, for complete instructions on determining this code.

elements.name: invoiceNumber
elements.description: The invoice number as issued by the Supplier. (Use alphanumeric and dash [‘-‘] only).

elements.name: filler1
elements.description: Space fill. Reserved filler for future expansion of the beginning Invoice Line Number.

elements.name: invoiceLineRange1Begin
elements.description: The first invoice line number that references the article.

elements.name: filler2
elements.description: Space fill. Reserved filler for future expansion of the ending Invoice Line Number.

elements.name: invoiceLineRange1End
elements.description: The ending invoice line number that references the article if a contiguous range of numbers is needed. If only a single line number is needed to specify the reference, repeat the beginning line number.

elements.name: filler3
elements.description: An additional Space fill. Reserved filler for future expansion of the beginning Invoice Line Number.

elements.name: invoiceLineRange2Begin
elements.description: An additional contiguous invoice line number that references the article.

elements.name: filler4
elements.description: An additional Space fill. Reserved filler for future expansion of the ending Invoice Line Number.

elements.name: invoiceLineRange2End
elements.description: An additional The ending invoice line number that references the article if a contiguous range of numbers is needed. If only a single line number is needed to specify the reference, repeat the beginning line number.

elements.name: filler5
elements.description: An additional Space fill. Reserved filler for future expansion of the beginning Invoice Line Number.

elements.name: invoiceLineRange3Begin
elements.description: An additional contiguous invoice line number that references the article.

elements.name: filler6
elements.description: An additional Space fill. Reserved filler for future expansion of the ending Invoice Line Number.

elements.name: invoiceLineRange3End
elements.description: An additional The ending invoice line number that references the article if a contiguous range of numbers is needed. If only a single line number is needed to specify the reference, repeat the beginning line number.

elements.name: filler7
elements.description: An additional Space fill. Reserved filler for future expansion of the beginning Invoice Line Number.

elements.name: invoiceLineRange4Begin
elements.description: An additional contiguous invoice line number that references the article.

elements.name: filler8
elements.description: An additional Space fill. Reserved filler for future expansion of the ending Invoice Line Number.

elements.name: invoiceLineRange4End
elements.description: An additional The ending invoice line number that references the article if a contiguous range of numbers is needed. If only a single line number is needed to specify the reference, repeat the beginning line number.

elements.name: filler9
elements.description: Space fill.
